thread.title: Bridget Elizabeth
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Bridget Elizabeth

author: Bridget Elizabeth
title: Bridget Elizabeth
text: After being highly recommended by a friend, I decided to contact Molly Stevens from Costa Rican Vacations to plan my upcoming trip. She was so helpful in planning an 8 day trip for my boyfriend and I. She responded quickly and in detail to all of my emails and gave us great options. She planned the vacation of our dreams for June and I am anxiously waiting the arrival! Our itinerary is beautiful, easy to follow and has everything in detail. I would recommend Costa Rican Vacations to anyone who asks. Thank you Molly!
